TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WindowPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示一个控件，该控件提供传统图形用户界面 (GUI) 中基于窗口的重要功能。

span.span: Represents a control that provides fundamental window-based functionality within a traditional graphical user interface (GUI).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持此控件模式的控件示例包括顶级应用程序窗口、 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-mdi-md.md)] 子窗口、模式对话框和气球状帮助窗口。Examples of controls that support this control pattern include top-level application windows, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-mdi-md.md)] child windows, modal dialogs and balloon help windows.

related.span: UI 自动化控件模式概述

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns Overview

related.span: 客户端的 UI 自动化控件模式

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns for Clients

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cached As WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation

summary.span: 获取此 中已缓存的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 一个结构，它包含控件模式中已缓存的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已缓存的属性值之前必须使用来请求 。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用 获取属性的当前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 有关可用属性及其用法的信息，请参阅 。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 请求的属性不在缓存中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CanMaximizeProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在中使用等效字段 。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，将一个根元素传递到一个函数，该函数返回作为根的后代并满足一组属性条件的自动化元素的集合。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of automation elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#100)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

span.span: Attempts to close the current window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在拆分窗格控件上调用时，此方法将关闭窗格并删除关联的拆分。When called on a split pane control, this method will close the pane and remove the associated split. 此方法还可能会关闭所有其他窗格，具体取决于实现。This method may also close all other panes depending on implementation. ## Examples 在下面的示例中， 从获取一个控件模式， 并随后用于关闭 。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and is subsequently used to close the . [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#102)]

exception.span: 控件无法执行请求的操作。

span.span: The control is unable to perform the requested action.
When the control is no longer available.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation

summary.span: 获取此 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 的当前 属性值。

span.span: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 一个结构，它包含此控件模式的当前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必须来自 具有引用的， 才能获取当前值。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果 是使用获取的 ，则它只包含缓存的数据，并且尝试获取任何属性的当前值会引发异常。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用 获取以前使用指定的属性的已缓存值 。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 有关可用属性及其用法的信息，请参阅 。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool WaitForInputIdle(int32 milliseconds) cil managed
Public Function WaitForInputIdle (milliseconds As Integer) As Boolean

param.name: milliseconds
param.span: 等待关联进程变为空闲状态的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait for the associated process to become idle.
The maximum is .

summary.span: 在指定时间阻止或在关联进程进入空闲状态之前持续阻止调用代码。

span.span: Causes the calling code to block for the specified time or until the associated process enters an idle state, whichever completes first.

returns.span: 如果窗口已进入空闲状态，则为 ；如果发生超时，则为 。

span.span: if the window has entered the idle state; if the timeout occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通常与的处理结合使用 。This method is typically used in conjunction with the handling of a . 实现依赖于基础应用程序框架;因此，此方法可能会在窗口准备好进入用户输入后返回一段时间。The implementation is dependent on the underlying application framework; therefore this method may return some time after the window is ready for user input. 调用代码不应依赖此方法来确定窗口何时进入空闲状态。The calling code should not rely on this method to ascertain exactly when the window has become idle. ## Examples 在下面的示例中， 从获取控件模式， 并使用 确认元素在合理的时间内可供用户交互。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and uses to confirm the element is ready for user interaction within a reasonable amount of time. [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

exception.span: 传入的参数不是有效数字。

span.span: The parameter passed in is not a valid number.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent WindowClosedEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly WindowClosedEvent As AutomationEvent

summary.span: 标识在关闭窗口时引发的事件。

span.span: Identifies the event that is raised when a window is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端应用程序可能需要侦听 缓存对象中的，因为窗口在关闭后立即从 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 控件视图结构中删除。A client application may need to listen for from a cached object since a window is removed from the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] control view structure immediately upon being closed. 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在中使用等效字段 。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，声明了事件侦听器，并为 和事件指定了委托 。In the following example, event listeners are declared and an delegate is specified for and events. [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#104)]
